data.name: Letterhead
data.lastPageFooter: Optional last page footer. This is configurable via Slogan in the Letterhead & Document Control. E.g. We are open 8am-6m Monday to Saturday. For out of hours emergencies, call (03) 9123 4567 for immediate veterinarian attention.
data.invoiceMsg:
Optional invoice message. This is configurable via Invoice Message in the Letterhead & Document Control. E.g.
Thank you for choosing OpenVPMS Demonstration Practice - we appreciate your business.
data.invoicePay:
Optional invoice payment instructions. These are configurable via Invoice Payment Instr. in the Letterhead & Document Control. E.g.
We accept payment by credit card, direct deposit and cheque. To pay by direct deposit, transfer to CBA account 'OpenVPMS Demonstration practice' 123-456-789 and email the confirmation.
data.receiptMsg:
Optional receipt message. It is configurable via Receipt Message in the Letterhead & Document Control. E.g.
Thank you for your payment and for choosing OpenVPMS Demonstration Practice - we appreciate your business.
data.estimateMsg:
Optional estimate message. It is configurable via Estimate Message in the Letterhead & Document Control E.g.
Please call us on (03) 9123 4567 if you have any queries about this estimate.
data.generalMsg: Optional message. This is configurable via General Message in the Letterhead & Document Control
data.orderMsg:
Optional order message. This is configurable via Order Message in the Letterhead & Document Control. E.g.
Please deliver all packages to the rear of the building.
data.supplierMsg: Optional supplier message. This is configurable via Supplier Message in the Letterhead & Document Control
data.pharmacyMsg: Optional pharmacy message. This is configurable via Pharmacy Message in the Letterhead & Document Control
data.creditCardInstructions:
Optional credit card instructions. These are configurable via Credit Card Instructions in the Letterhead & Document Control. E.g.
To pay by Visa, Mastercard or American Express, fill in the remittance advice and email, fax or post to the address shown. Alternatively, phone us on (03) 9123 4567.
data.directDepositInstructions:
Optional direct deposit instructions. These are configurable via Direct Deposit Instructions in the Letterhead & Document Control. E.g.
To pay by direct deposit, transfer to CBA account 'OpenVPMS Demonstration practice' 123-456-789 and email the confirmation.
data.paymentOption3:
Optional payment instructions. These are configurable via Payment Option 3 in the Letterhead & Document Control. E.g
To pay by cheque, make the cheque payable to OpenVPMS Demonstration Practice, fill in the remittance advice below and both to the address shown.
data.paymentOption4: Optional payment instructions. These are configurable via Payment Option 4 in the Letterhead & Document Control. E.g. if you support PayPal or some other payment method. It may be left blank.
data.groupRemindMsg:
This is configurable via Reminder Message in the Letterhead & Document Control. E.g.
Our records indicate that your pet(s) named above are due for some in-clinic treatments.

data.name: Default Appointment Reminder SMS Template
data.description: <patient>'s appointment at <location> is confirmed for <date/time>. Call us on <phone> if you need to change the appointment
data.content: concat(expr:if(expr:var('patient.name') != '', concat(expr:var('patient.name'), "'s"), 'Your'), ' appointment at ' , $location.name,' is confirmed for ', date:formatDate($appointment.startTime, 'short'), ' @ ', date:formatTime($appointment.startTime, 'short'), $nl, 'Call us on ', party:getTelephone($location), ' if you need to change the appointment')

data.name: Sample Vaccination Reminder SMS Template
data.description: <patient> is due for a vaccination at <location>. Call us on <phone> to make an appointment
data.content: concat($patient.name, ' is due for a vaccination at ', $location.name, '.', $nl, 'Please contact us on ', party:getTelephone($location), ' to make an appointment')
